website_summaries.verdict: The best budget pair of kick pads meant for light and mobile practice when a small amount of protection is needed.
pros: Padding surface is more firmer than other budget options, offering good resistance against most common kicks
The pads slide onto each hand quickly and remain firmly in place without limiting mobility
cons: Proper use and technique are required to keep the body protected during regular practice or sparring

customer_reviews.title: STINKS to high heaven
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be made decently...I will update with further use, but its being used infrequentlly by a 5 year old, so I can't imagine it getting too beat up. I took off 3 stars because it SMELLS so strongly of chemical / plastic. I left it outside for 2 days to air it out, and it still reeks. I've never bought anything that smelled so strongly. I have to store it in a plastic bag in a separate room when not in use because it stinks up the whole house. It's awful. I won't order these again just because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: KellBell

customer_reviews.title: Came defective...strong odor
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered red ones from this brand before and they were fine. The blue ones came defective and has a really strong odor to it. Had to order replacement product. Hopefully the new set will be okay. **update**got replacement and they came defective again as smell or horrible. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Kicking Paddles
customer_reviews.text: My sons bought these paddles so they could practice their Tae Kwon Do kicking. They said they are comparable with the paddles they have at their Doe Jang. Overall decent quality although one of the black straps broke off. Not sure if it was poor quality or rough boys. Maybe a little of both. My son Noah sewed the strap back on an no further problems.
customer_reviews.author: William Struse

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. They allow us to practice kicking with targets at home which helps keep my son's interest in Tae Kwon Do. They are great for the price and very usable, you get some of the clapping noise when kicking them. Not quite as nice as some of the ones at the studio, but close and they meet our needs without breaking the bank. I don't recall whether there was a smell when unboxing the targets, but definitely fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for practice
customer_reviews.text: We just got these for my son's for Christmas. They are in their first and second years of Tae Kwon Do and were so excited to receive them. They seem to be a good quality. They don't make a big slapping noise but they are sturdy and sewn together well. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

customer_reviews.title: It's not too bad after airing them outside for 2 days
customer_reviews.text: As some reviewers pointed out, these kick pads emit strong chemical odor. It's not too bad after airing them outside for 2 days, but I can still smell it if bring them close to face. Hope they go away soon. Other than the smell, these look & feel well made and solid.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDwellerTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my almost 10 year old TKD ninja. We use them almost daily for sparring practice. I noticed that some reviews said they smell like chemicals and had to air them out. We had no problems like that with ours. Opened the bag and could use immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my nephew who is a recently began TaeKwanDo. These are the kind they use at his studio (Sorry, I don't know the equivalent of dojo in Korean. I learned Karate. :-) ) Anyway, they seem to be of good quality and my nephew enjoys striking them and making then "snap." We'll see how they hold of with time but I'm optimistic that he will get my money's worth out of them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Riemer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. My son goes to taekwondo and very active. This is similar to what they use in the class and he loves it when I practice with him at home.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for my Hapkido students
customer_reviews.text: I am an old student of martial arts and have studied, trained and taught for the past 43 years. The paddles are actually cheaper than a wholesale account I have with several martial art supply companies. They are perfect for my Hapkido students.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Redd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kick pads.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice kick pads, my 8 year old loves them. He was hoping they would make more of a pop, but they are loud enough. They did have a very strong smell when they were opened, which we did in the car (I would not recommend that). But after a couple days hanging in the garage the smell was pretty much gone. They are already getting good use.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay Bicksler

customer_reviews.title: Bad logo
customer_reviews.text: Good product. So far this kicking pad is holding ... for my 10year old. The only thing I felt was odd was the logo on the pads were stamped like it was a mirror image. The only way to read the logo was when you see it in a mirror. Sounds like they like giving rejected items to their customers to save a buck. Well, this is probably the last time buying from this company. Yes, the kick pad is lasting, but you never know what can happen next time you buy something from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bargain, Lasted a Long Time
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand/model for a couple of years now and they work fine. YES they have a strong chemical smell in the beginning but with time that fades and after a few weeks/months it vanishes. For the price, they lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ian

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A good quality product, no complaints. Only one thing would make it better, if the edges were a little more padded as well so you could use it as a pretend hatchet of sorts to practice blocking with the kids .
customer_reviews.author: polymerman

customer_reviews.title: Great for personal use but not so much for a professional school
customer_reviews.text: They work fine. The wrist loop is flimsy but no one really needs that. I wouldn't use at a commercial school, simply because the logos are printed backwards, and it would convey lack of professionalism. For personal use, they great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K and R

customer_reviews.title: The strap brakes easily
customer_reviews.text: We only used these a couple of times before the wrist strap broke. It frayed a lot so had to cut the strap shortening it so now it is uncomfortable to use and had to fix it by sewing it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Poole

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cardio kickboxing class. They are simple, easy and a great way to engage with students if you are a trainer or teaching a non-impact cardio class.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home use. Quality is good for the price. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Alan K Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Bought this set for my kids and we use the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my kids and we use the almost every night to practice. This really helps them with training and coordination
customer_reviews.author: Joe Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: These kick paddles are a great buy for the money. They are plenty sturdy enough for personal use. I suspect they'd hold up for at least a year or 2 in a class-setting. I highly recommend these for anyone who's interested in getting some practice at home!
customer_reviews.author: From DetroitTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable kick pads
customer_reviews.text: Good and durable kick pads, make a snapping sound when you hit it properly. They had some smelt when arrived but its gone a day later. And finally, they were delivered just in couple days, as if it would be a Amazon delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Vinyukov

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my boys!
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality. My son and husband use these to practice Taekwondo
customer_reviews.author: BossB

customer_reviews.title: ... hoping for but overall for the price they are good enough. I primarily bought them for my son
customer_reviews.text: The targets are a bit smaller than I was hoping for but overall for the price they are good enough. I primarily bought them for my son, he's still a little guy so they are plenty big enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice... I got them for my son so he can practice at home. Nice quality and can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Adams

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price! Sturdy for lots of kicking practice. You need a set of these if you are taking Taekwondo for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: cannot use due to strong chemical odor, leaves your hands smelling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for learning to target kicks. Holds up pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. So far they are holding up to a pretty good beating
customer_reviews.author: Roy Hinman

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I use this as punching mitts for my kid not one kick. You would never suspect them to fall apart from just hooks and jabs, from a 10 year old. I can still use but who knows for how much longer.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kick Pads
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, well made, and can take a kick. Soft enough to kick, but durable to keep kicking. Easy to hold. The wrist strap is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Owl

customer_reviews.title: The real thing!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, durable...exactly like what we use in our dojang. Perfect for target kicking drills.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: my son likes it very much, with it, he can practice at home with his dad.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for practice at home. Nice sturdy handle. We have had them for a couple months and they seem to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s a good purchase. Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pads for kicking. They have a smell when you first open them but it dissipates fairly soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Home Practice
customer_reviews.text: My son and I are taekwondo blackbelts and these are great for when we practice at home.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and solid, I could kick the tar out of these and they would hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and solid, I could kick the tar out of these and they would hold up well.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: are you looking for 2 TKD style clapping kick pads?  Then look no further!
customer_reviews.text: are you looking for 2 TKD style clapping kick pads? Then look no further!

customer_reviews.title: Great Kick Pads
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and are great for practicing Tae Kwon Do with our son who's ten.

customer_reviews.title: IT IS REALLY HELPFUL AND IS A GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: IT REALLY HELPS YOU WITH MARTIAL ARTS PRACTICE.IT IS SOFT AND DOES NOT HURT WHEN YOU KICK IT.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! My son said they feel exactly like the ones they use at his Tae kwon do studio.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, our kids get to train at home with these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer B

customer_reviews.title: Good pads for good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pad for kids and beginners. Makes a nice pop when hit correctly, and the handle has a little flex/give to it which helps when being kicked by stronger persons. Oh, and no toxic smell.

customer_reviews.title: Great for home practice
customer_reviews.text: These kick pads are great for practicing kicks at home, outside of Taekwondo class. They are sturdy and quality.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them! I do too!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for taekwondo or just playing around. They do need a little airing out when first opened, but they are fine now.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Recommended 100%

customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as pictured. If you're familiar with TKD kicking targets, these are a good buy. Shipped fast, too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: This item was a great value I bought it for my grandson who is ...
customer_reviews.text: This item was a great value I bought it for my grandson who is 5 just started taekwondo it is better quality than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great pads - grat value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and son who are both Black Belts in Taekwondo. Very happy with the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: These came in today, it's in excellent condition and DOES NOT have a smell. Thank goodness!! We are very happy with ours. Already I'm practicing with my daughter! It's like mommy and daughter time with our practice sessions! It works just like the ones in her tae kwon do class. I highly recommend. Thank you guys.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Got it 2 days ago and I am giving 3 stars so far. Not sure about quality control as the markings are reversed (see photo). Not lower because (so fas, at least) it works for what it is intended. Seems look weak (see second photo). Lets see how “durable” this Durable Kick Pad is...
customer_reviews.author: WWII Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. They are not as loud as the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. They are not as loud as the ones in my kids Tae Kwon Do school. They did have a bit of a chemical smell, so i had to leave them in the garage a couple of days. These are perfect for my 4 and 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Never took them out of the packaging. They appear to be well made as I’ve read in other comments prior to purchase. However, they are really small compared to the ones at our martial arts facility. Great price but the size I think caters more to smaller children up to age 8. Past age 8 I would definitely look into purchasing an adult (larger) kicking target.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I use these to practice at home. We use similar ones in Taekwondo Class. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: SLup

product_meta.title: YosooPack of 2 Taekwondo Durable Kick Pad Target Tae Kwon Do Karate Kickboxing Training
feature_bullets: 【High-quality materials】: The double-leaf target is made of high-quality PU+EVA, and the inner layer is made of special reinforced high-light elastic board, which is wear-resistant, corrosion-resistant and light in weight.

【Application】: This Taekwondo Durable Kick Pad Target is used by Taekwondo (or other martial arts) enthusiasts to practice low and high kicks! The entire body is sturdy and durable. Can help you assess the efficiency of kicking and the accuracy of the hit.

【Excellent Design】: This double-sided goal is an ideal design for practicing high and low kicks, which improves speed, accuracy and strength. This is the best choice for most Taekwondo enthusiasts as well as Taekwondo pavilions and clubs.

【Safe and reliable】: This Taekwondo foot target is very easy to use, safe and reliable. Suitable for taekwondo, martial arts and other batting exercises. A wrist strap prevents the kick pad from falling.

【Quality Guaranteed】:"If you have any question or any unsatisfactory about the product , please do not hesitate to contact us , we do must help you solve the issue well . When we received it, we will deal with it as soon as possible.
